server
Interface ChatServer

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChatServerImpl
public interface ChatServer
extends java.rmi.Remote

Its a remote interface which provides methods which are accessible from the remote server

Method Summary
